name: Roll'D & Dice'D
description:
Sorry about no music :(

NOTE: Landing on ANY of the food props except for the doughnuts and giant fillet, WILL reset you as they are not the "field".

Food Asset by:  Mumifier Studio

Idea by: Schnorbus

How To Play:

Launch your dice towards the flag (usually located at the center)

The number you roll is the amount of power you have next swing.

The player with the lowest number of shots wins.

Controls:

Player 1

  • Left - A
  • Right - D
  • Up - W
  • Down - D
  • Launch/Select - Space

Player 2

  • Left - F
  • Right - H
  • Up - T
  • Down - G
  • Launch/Select - M

Player 3

  • Left - J
  • Right - L
  • Up - I
  • Down - K
  • Launch/Select - "/"

Player 4

  • Left - Left Arrow
  • Right - Right Arrow
  • Up - Up Arrow
  • Down - Down Arrow
  • Launch/Select - "\"
